attributes.action: Britain's MP's declare genocide of Rohingya Muslims & provide military help
attributes.background: Reported by Sky's Alex Crawford, 13/11/2017 Rohingya Muslims are trapped on a beach between Myanmar & Bangladesh. No food, no water. Land mines & soldiers using violence on both sides. Malnourished women, children & babies. Physically sickening to watch. How can the West just watch? This is genocide
